thread.title: Monique Eagan

author: Monique Eagan
title: Monique Eagan
text: Once again the book store ran out of a required book for my daughters class. I found the book on Amazon for $142 and thought I was lucky since her schools bookstore was selling it for $192. I found it on Biblio.com for $70.75. I know this sounds too good to be true but it wasn't. It was the exact book we needed for half the price. I will shop for all my my college kids books here from now on!! Thank you!!
